CustomField.description: The checkbox indicates whether the record of the [Related Object Name] needs to be deleted. If ‘true’, records need to be deleted, otherwise masked (Available only if the process is Masking).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The checkbox indicates whether the record of the [Related Object Name] needs to be deleted. If ‘true’, records need to be deleted, otherwise masked (Available only if the process is Masking).
CustomField.label: Delete Related Records
